> Will it work OK to use one type of DB in production (Oracle, in my 
> case) and another type of DB to test against (something free, like 
> mySQL)? I am nowhere near a SQL Guru. Couldn't we have some SQL that 
> didn't work for both systems, or is that rare?

i have seen problems like 
http://listserv.sap.com/pipermail/sapdb.general/2001-November/009149.html

and probably you will have to maintain two different db-access layers and their
corresponding tests, maybe this:
http://java.sun.com/blueprints/patterns/j2ee_patterns/data_access_object/index.html

Bernd
subject: RE: [junit] Unit Testing Database Code/Different RDBMS Systems
